sentences.en: A motorist needs good visual acuity .
sentences.cn: 驾车者需要良好的视敏度。

sentences.en: Applicants may submit completed visual acuity records at the CWI exam location.
sentences.cn: 应试者可于焊接检测师考场缴交视力检查报告.

sentences.en: He had mild tinnitus, and slightly decreased auditory acuity.
sentences.cn: 他有轻度耳鸣, 并且听力稍减.

sentences.en: In disuse strabismus , disturbance of visual acuity was present before strabismus developed.
sentences.cn: 弱视是引起视力障碍最多见的疾病.

sentences.en: Main Outcome Measures LogMAR visual acuity, BCVA, contrast sensitivity and stereoscopic vision.
sentences.cn: 主要指标LogMAR视力 、 最佳矫正视力 、 对比敏感度、立体视锐度.

sentences.en: Nowadays the acuity of pseudophakic patients can be restored to normal standard.
sentences.cn: 目前白内障摘出术后的人工晶状体眼视力可以恢复到接近正常.

sentences.en: On examination, her visual acuity was normal and without apparent proptosis.
sentences.cn: 眼科学检查两眼大致正常.

sentences.en: Postoperative visual acuity of 45 eyes ( 70 % ) was obviously improved.
sentences.cn: 术后64只眼行视力检查,45只眼 ( 70% ) 视力有明显提高.

sentences.en: Preoperative axial length, postoperative visual acuity and refractive error were recorded.
sentences.cn: 记录术前眼轴长度和术后视力、屈光度数,观察术中 、 术后并发症.

sentences.en: Results The visual acuity of 12 eyes ( 70.09 % ) was above 0.05.
sentences.cn: 术后随访平均2月,观察其效果.

sentences.en: This equates to increased and vigor, better sleep and sharper mental acuity.
sentences.cn: 也就是说可以起到增强活力, 改善睡眠,提高心智的作用.

sentences.en: Treatment options and goals depend on the acuity of hepatic encephalopathy.
sentences.cn: 治疗方法的选择及目的依据肝性脑病的程度而定.

sentences.en: Warm up the emotion, acuity feeling, brighten the mood.
sentences.cn: 温暖情绪, 敏锐感觉和增强记忆,使人心情愉快.

sentences.en: We work on improving visual acuity.
sentences.cn: 我们致力于提高视觉的敏锐度。

sentences.en: What I about Yi's offensive game is his versatility and mental acuity.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢易建联的进攻,因为他反应敏捷,无所不能.

sentences.en: What visual acuity is required for the most important vision tasks?
sentences.cn: 对于重要观察来说,我们需要怎样的视敏度?

trans.tran_cn: 尖锐，（疾病的）剧烈，（视力、才智等的）敏锐，敏度
trans.tran_en: the ability to think, see, or hear clearly
